questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to define an unordered list?
questions.explanation: <ul> defines an unordered list. <ol> is for ordered lists.

questions.question: What CSS property controls the text size?
questions.explanation: `font-size` is the property used to define the size of text in CSS.

questions.question: Which logo represents JavaScript?
questions.explanation: The yellow square with JS is the JavaScript logo.

questions.question: What keyword declares a variable in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: `let` is commonly used to declare variables in modern JavaScript.
